top_clans_fight: The top three clans will battle for the championship title and a cash prize!
no_qualified_clans: No clan has qualified for the final tournament yet.
rules_description: The final tournament will pit the top 3 clans of the season against each other in a direct elimination format.
rule_1: Each clan faces all other clans
rule_2: No ranking distinction between clans for matches
rule_3: Each match is played in a 'Best of 3' format
rule_4: All players from each clan will participate
